ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: J.B., R.S., C.F., N.K., and M.O. acknowledge support from EU FP7 project IMPACT2C (grant no. 282746) and the European Research Council Synergy grant IMBALANCE‐P (grant no. ERC‐2013‐SynG‐610028). M.M. acknowledges support from the Ministry of Agriculture of the Czech Republic (projects no. RO0416 and QJ1610547). Model input data were obtained from sources listed in Table 1. Crop management data needed to reproduce our simulations and data underlying the figures are available at http://pure.iiasa.ac.at/15104 (DOI: https://doi.org/10.22022/ESM/02-2018.15104). The authors have used the EPIC v.0810 model version available from https://epicapex.tamu.edu.
